intro_text: There are dark clouds on the horizon and p_l wonders if they should continue.
decline_text: Your patrol decides to head back early.

success_outcomes.text: While it's pretty gray up there, the promised rain never comes.
The cats become wet from the rain but otherwise the patrol is successful.
s_c makes a careful judgement, and the patrol keeps going, but they make sure to stay on the high ground as the rain pours down around them.
It's not worth the risk - s_c convinces the patrol to head for home.

fail_outcomes.text: There is a downpour and a sudden flood from the overflowing river sweeps all of the cats in the patrol away.

history_text.reg_death: This cat was drowned by floodwaters.

intro_text: Your patrol hears some odd noises coming from an abandoned Twoleg nest out on the plains.
decline_text: Your patrol decides not to investigate.

success_outcomes.text: It's just an odd loner singing to themself. The patrol greets them, and as the loner isn't inside c_n territory, it's a polite interaction without any hostility.

Your patrol walks into an ambush by a group of rogues. It's only by the grace of StarClan that s_c is there, fighting with the ferocity of LionClan, the strength of TigerClan, and the flexibility of LeopardClan. Shaken, but no more than bruised, the patrol manages to retreat to safety.

s_c signals for the patrol to stop. Carefully, quietly, {PRONOUN/s_c/subject} {VERB/s_c/explain/explains} {PRONOUN/s_c/poss} concerns about the unknown situation. And maybe {PRONOUN/s_c/subject}{VERB/s_c/'re/'s} being too cautious - but then p_l picks up on the scent of strange cats around the Twoleg den. Forewarned, the patrol retreats to safety.

fail_outcomes.text: Your patrol walks into an ambush by a group of rogues and everyone is slaughtered.

history_text.reg_death: This cat died from being ambushed by rogues.

It's just an odd loner singing to themself. When they see r_c, they invite {PRONOUN/r_c/object} to sing too. {PRONOUN/r_c/subject/CAP} politely {VERB/r_c/decline/declines} and continues on {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} solo patrol.
s_c walks into an ambush by a group of rogues. It's only by the grace of StarClan that s_c has the fighting skill and confidence to escape, running for {PRONOUN/s_c/poss} life.

intro_text: As the patrol crosses a beach, shivering with the cold, there's a creaking, rushing sound, like a wave - but out of sync with the ocean.
decline_text: Your patrol scrambles back the way they came, fluffed up and panting.

success_outcomes.text: The cats leap forward, dashing to the other side of the beach and up onto the rocks. They make it in time to watch the beach get lost under a tide of water from inland.

s_c shouts to get back! The patrol scrambles back the way they came and watches the beach disappear under a flood of water. It leaves behind a changed landscape, tons of debris - and a large dead sheep. Your cats pounce on the opportunity to scavenge.

s_c shrieks at the strange sound, paws digging into the sand as {PRONOUN/s_c/subject} turn and run for home. The rest of the patrol yowls at {PRONOUN/s_c/object} to stop, running after {PRONOUN/s_c/object}, but s_c is proven right when the beach disappears under a flood of water from inland. {PRONOUN/s_c/subject/CAP}{VERB/s_c/'ve/'s} saved them all.

fail_outcomes.text: The cats are in the middle of the beach when the flood hits them, freezing water rushing from inland, sweeping them straight out to sea to die in the cold ocean.

history_text.reg_death: This cat was swept out to sea by a flood.
history_text.lead_death: {VERB/m_c/were/was} swept out to sea by a flood

s_c makes a careful judgement, and the patrol keeps going. They stick to solid ground, sometimes routing themselves through the trees as the rain begins to pour around them.
It's not worth the risk - s_c convinces the patrol to head for home.

fail_outcomes.text: There is a downpour and a sudden flood from the overflowing river in the swamp sweeps all of the cats in the patrol away.

intro_text: As the patrol crosses a muddy bog, shivering with the cold, there's a creaking, rushing sound, like a wave - but the swamp shouldn't have any waves.
decline_text: Your patrol scrambles back the way they came, fluffed up and panting.

success_outcomes.text: The cats leap forward, dashing to the other side of the bog and up into the trees. They make it in time to watch the swamp get lost under a tide of water from inland.

s_c shouts to get back! The patrol scrambles back the way they came and watches the swamp disappear under a flood of water. It leaves behind a changed landscape, tons of debris - and a large dead sheep. Your cats pounce on the opportunity to scavenge.

s_c shrieks at the strange sound, paws digging into the mud as {PRONOUN/s_c/subject} turn and run for home. The rest of the patrol yowls at {PRONOUN/s_c/object} to stop, running after {PRONOUN/s_c/object}, but s_c is proven right when the swamp disappears under a flood of water from inland. {PRONOUN/s_c/subject/CAP}{VERB/s_c/'ve/'s} saved them all.

fail_outcomes.text: The cats are in the middle of the bog when the flood hits them, freezing water rushing past, sweeping them straight out into the churning river, under it's ice.

history_text.reg_death: This cat was killed by a flood.

intro_text: As the patrol is marking the border lines, a gang of rogues bursts from the bushes! An ambush!
decline_text: The patrol turns tail and races away! The borders left open for the rogues to muddy.

success_outcomes.text: The patrol descends into battle without a second thought, eventually driving the rogues away.

s_c immediately leaps to protect {PRONOUN/s_c/poss} Clanmates, {PRONOUN/s_c/poss} ferocity in battle quickly terrifying the rogues. Realizing that they've sorely underestimated the Clan cats, the rogues turn tail and run.
s_c revels in the battle, leaping into the fray with {PRONOUN/s_c/poss} teeth bared and claws ready. The rogues are quickly driven away by the patrol.

fail_outcomes.text: The rogues greatly outnumber the patrol and have no trouble defeating them. The fallen warriors' bodies are recovered the next day, covered in battle wounds and cold.

history_text.scar: This cat was badly scarred when rogues ambushed their patrol.
history_text.reg_death: This cat was killed when rogues ambushed {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} patrol.

fail_outcomes.text: Taken by surprise, the patrol scatters and loses cohesion. The rogues are quick to take advantage of the confusion and eventually the patrol retreats, r_c badly wounded.

fail_outcomes.text: The rogues greatly outnumber the patrol and have no trouble defeating them. The fallen warriors' bodies are found the next day, covered in battle wounds and cold.

history_text.scar: m_c was badly scarred when rogues ambushed {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} patrol.
history_text.reg_death: This cat was killed when rogues ambushed {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} patrol.

fail_outcomes.text: Taken by surprise, the patrol scatters and loses cohesion. The rogues are quick to take advantage of the confusion and r_c is badly wounded, forcing the patrol to retreat.
